## mixOsc variable

HOF oscillator. Takes 2 stateless oscillator fns and returns new oscillator function which produces an interpolated result of both. The returned function takes an additional `mix` arg (\[0..1\] range) control contributions of either oscillator (default: 0.5 aka 50/50 ratio).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mixOsc: (osc1: StatelessOscillator, osc2: StatelessOscillator) => StatelessOscillator
```
